about_the_game:
Special Case is a Superhero Action-Adventure Game

Where you play as "Ahmed" a teenager with Agility and Strength Superpowers,

Fighting his way through the city to free it from the Occupation Forces.
These Forces use Advanced Military Equipment like Drones, Lasers, Turrets, Armoured Vehicles and Helicopters.

Using his superpowers he can climb large walls and wall run Massive Buildings in seconds,
Destroy Enemy Vehicles, Turrets and Drones with his Melee or Ranged Attacks.
Force Fields that Damages Enemies and throws everything in its range far away and many more superpowers.

The Character can Explore the City which have a lot of different areas for explorations (Poor Areas, Islands, Skyscrapers, Towers, Parks, Construction Sites and much more)

The map has a variety of collectables around the map, these collectables are Skins, Special Powers and Skill Points that can be traded for Upgrades.

This is an Open World Story Driven Game where you Finish Missions and tasks for the story to progress and the further you go the harder it gets so be prepared.
